ModMetaData.name: Free the Nipple
ModMetaData.author: OkraDonkey
ModMetaData.description:
Uncovered torsos no longer cause women to feel naked and embarrassed. (Uncovered legs still cause both men and women to feel naked.)
Compatibility: I don't know of any incompatibilities, but if you find one, let me know and I'll fix it or mark it.
Note: This is my first Harmony mod, so please feel free to make technical suggestions or otherwise critique the code.
This mod: - Should be safe to add or remove at any time from your save. - Can be placed anywhere in the mod list after Harmony. - Doesn't add or remove anything - it just alters the PsychologicallyNude method to evaluate females the same as males.
Inspired by u/warm-rimmer.
